        Returns:

      • search

        public static int[] search​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> subDictionary,
                           java.lang.String wordToSearch,
                           int startIndex,
                           int endIndex)
        RECURSIVE METHOD: Searches for a String in an ArrayList of String
        Parameters:
        subDictionary - represents the ArrayList of String to be searched into
        wordToSearch - represents the String to be searched for
        startIndex - Int representing the starting Index
        endIndex - Int representing the ending index
        Returns:
        search[0]: int representing found (0 = false), search[1]: int representing the index to append at
